mods.abstract: This file contains a copy of an article written by Elizabeth Monroe (then of The Economistand formerly diplomatic correspondent of The Observer) that is entitled 'Russia's Oil Imperialism'.The article analyses the oil policy of Soviet Russia (with reference to the Gulf) and was sent to Cornelius James Pelly, Political Agent in Bahrain by William Rupert Hay, the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf on January 22 1949.
